entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
